recipe.title: Spiced Pumpkin & Chorizo Risotto with Crispy Sage
recipe.author: GPT Chef

steps.description: Finely chop the onion and garlic. Remove chorizo from casing and crumble.
Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Add garlic and chorizo and cook until chorizo is browned.
Add Arborio rice to the pan and toast for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly.
Add spiced pumpkin pie spice and stir to combine.
Begin adding chicken broth, one cup at a time, stirring constantly and allowing the rice to absorb the liquid before adding more. Repeat until all broth is used and rice is creamy.
Stir in pumpkin puree and Parmesan cheese.
While risotto is cooking, fry sage leaves in a small amount of olive oil until crispy. Drain on paper towels.
Serve risotto topped with crispy sage leaves.
